name: Space Game: StellarScaping
short_description:
Using something I've made? http://www.arrall.com Please, consider contributing in some way to any app I'm working on.

http://www.stellarscaping.com

Beginnings of a Flash 11.7 space shooter and strategy game. So far: Turrets, Drones with formations, health bars. i, o, p, spacebar generate ships that fight each other. Move with asdw. Zoom with mousewheel.

The plan is to include missions and a semi-multiplayer universe that expands as players explore, fight off alien/NPC hordes, and liberate systems/planets. 

The following are examples of earlier work using much worse graphics.

http://www.kongregate.com/games/wubitog/starscape-2-timed-battle

http://www.kongregate.com/games/wubitog/starscape-3
summary: 2D Spaceship battles. Capital ship w/ turrets and drone fighters vs ai
